input: What is the total amount of transactions for bank accounts that have been locked and have entries in the last 30 days?

output.sql: SELECT SUM(T2.Amount) FROM BankAccount AS T1 JOIN BankAccountEntries AS T2 ON T1.UUID = T2.BankAccountUUID WHERE T1.ID IN (SELECT ID FROM BankAccountContractLockRequest WHERE ValidityEndDate > CURRENT_DATE) AND T2.TransactionDate > DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 30 DAY);
